speaker: Dark Stream
lines: You reach a narrow stream running dark over stone.
You see fish flash under the surface.
Roots knot across the water where you could cross.
Coins lie in the silt near the bank.
A feather turns in an eddy.
Fog gathers along the far shore and thins again.

choices.text: Toss a coin and make no wish.
Walk upstream where the fog thins.
